PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-15792006-12-14,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (HUMAN PLASMA COLLECTED BY PLASMAPHERESIS) by updating the existing regulatory provisions to reflect current methods and practices used to collect human plasma as well as the list of transmissible diseases for which tests must be performed.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0353 Publication Date: 2006-12-27
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (HUMAN PLASMA COLLECTED BY PLASMAPHERESIS) by updating the existing regulatory provisions to reflect current methods and practices used to collect human plasma as well as the list of transmissible diseases for which tests must be performed.
